page.title: 11EDUCATION
page.content: In the morning I get woken up by an alarm-clock at 7 o'clock.For breakfast I have cereal,coffee and biscuits. At 8:20am.I go out for school. Sometimes I get the bus to school, sometimes I run there. 9:00am.assembly takes place follow by Maths.After Maths we have a 15 minute break.Then we have studies for an hour.In studies we do such things as Geography,History Nature or Science. Next we have lunch it takes 1 hour. Then we have English which usually consists of spelling, comprehention, composition and other things.In Maths and English some people have to change classes,but in studies everybody stays in their own class.We have another break after English at 2:15pm till 2:30pm.This is followed by either Art,Craft,Games or Physical Education then we go home at 3:30.
